content:
Albin Ekdal admits he’s ‘disappointed’ with Sampdoria’s season so far and fears ‘resuming too early’ can lead to injuries after the long break.
The 30-year-old, who tested positive for the coronavirus last month, admitted that he hasn’t been thinking a lot a… [+1488 chars]
